LanguageData.BlacksmithApprentice.label: BlacksmithApprentice
LanguageData.BlacksmithApprentice.description: You can master the techniques of making NagayariSpears and JapaneseBow.
LanguageData.BlacksmithArtisan.label: BlacksmithArtisan
LanguageData.BlacksmithArtisan.description: You can master the techniques of making AsigaruArmor, JingasaHelmet, JumonjiSpear and OdachiBlade.
LanguageData.BlacksmithMaster.label: BlacksmithMaster
LanguageData.BlacksmithMaster.description: You can master the techniques of making SyogunArmor, SyogunHelmet, TanegasimaGun.
